body_html:
@Sohl-Dickstein: done. I determined the new learning rate for the softmax tutorial by cross validation:
https://gist.github.com/basveeling/0b43d5d9fe533e9aaf710d13356931f4
I haven't validated the results for the convolutional mnist network in the pros tutorial due to lack of gpu, but someone can verify this with https://gist.github.com/basveeling/80b11bf657891c0c8f253c899a4be99d .
